This is the master 8x8 font that I used in Chaste Tris. How I obtained it is a weird story that would take a long time to tell.
I plan to use it on retro video game systems.


/* char:    */

/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00

/* char: !  */

/* 00110000 */ 30
/* 01111000 */ 78
/* 01111000 */ 78
/* 01111000 */ 78
/* 00110000 */ 30
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00110000 */ 30
/* 00000000 */ 00

/* char: "  */

/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00
/* 00000000 */ 00

/* char: #  */

/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 11111110 */ FE
/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 11111110 */ FE
/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 01101100 */ 6C
/* 00000000 */ 00

/* char: $  */

/* 00110000 */ 30
/* 01111100 */ 7C
/* 11000000 */ C0

/* 00110000 */ 30
/* 00000000 */ 00

/* 00000000 */ 00
